allow: Bash(cmd.exe /c "adb shell am force-stop com.mobilebridgeapp && adb shell am start -n com.mobilebridgeapp/.MainActivity")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "taskkill /F /IM node.exe 2>nul || echo No node processes")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "adb shell input keyevent 82 && timeout 2 && adb shell input text r && adb shell input text r")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "adb shell input keyevent 82 && timeout /t 2 >nul && adb shell input text r && adb shell input text r")
